title: Reborn Only to Love You Again - Novel Updates
tags: Age Progression   Cold Love Interests   Death of Loved Ones   Modern Day   Reincarnation   Second Chance   Seme Protagonist   Suicides   Tragic Past
author: 一个小瓶盖
description:
When Wang Dahu saw Li Qingran attempting suicide by cutting his wrist right in front of his grave, he thought, 

“If I could turn back time:

     I will treasure you.

     I will protect you.

     I will love you a hundred times, a thousand times, more than right now.”

When time really did turn back, Li Qingran would have a life time of happiness!>
